arts.ttl: Paul Merson believes beating Fulham could be huge for Arsenal in title race
arts.sum: Paul Merson believes that Arsenal have the opportunity to make a major statement in the Premier League title race if they can overcome Fulham this weekend. The Gunners currently sit at the top of the table and could move four points clear of Liverpool by the start of the new week, depending on results elsewhere. […] The post Paul Merson believes beating Fulham could be huge for Arsenal in title race appeared first on Just Arsenal News.

arts.ttl: From the press box: Fulham could be without six for Gunners clash
arts.sum: Jack Kelly gives us the low-down from Marco Silva's pre-Arsenal presser.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta eager to end a poor run at Fulham
arts.sum: They drew 2-2 with Arteta’s men at the Emirates Stadium in August 2023, defeated them 2-1 at Craven Cottage at the end of the year, and drew 1-1 with Arsenal at their home in December 2024. We know that it's a really tough place to go, they're a very well-coached team, and we're going to have to be at our best tomorrow.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva believes Arsenal have the best players in the world in one position
Why have Arsenal fared so badly against Fulham?
arts.sum: Since Marco Silva steered the side into the top tier, they have lost by more than one goal only once in six meetings, taking four points from the last two trips of their fellow Londoners to Craven Cottage . Opponents knew how to handle Odegaard as a supporting act for the right winger while Arteta was figuring out where best to house Kai Havertz from the left.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta provides injury update on Martin Odegaard and Martin Zubimendi ahead of Fulham clash
Fulham vs Arsenal predictions made as pundits expect major Premier League title race statement
arts.sum: Premier League leaders Arsenal will be looking to extend their winning streak to five consecutive matches in all competitions when they face Fulham at Craven Cottage on Saturday
